body:
Is this mod allowed?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v8UFajPb6Pc&list=UUQbFWOAMehoIAtCdbV7NATg
It shows if you are being shot at with arrows and tells when your health is low.
I'm just wondering if this is allowed.
Also this doesn't really matter but it shows your last death spot.

title: Just Curious.

replies.body:
It looks quite fishy actually ... o.O

Off-Topic. When he said "swagmoney", I puked a bit in my mouth. xD

replies.body: I would say it's a advantage. You become a massage if you are shot and you can hide your self. And also if your health is low, it's remind you to dring a health potion or to eat a gapple.

replies.body: It's allowed, It's like optifine and cammabright is better for you and don't give advantages for you and for any other players. ALLOWED

replies.body: I use OptiFine but it never tells me when I'm being shot while I'm attacking somebody else or even crafting armor in peace. No, serious now, how do you compare this mod with OptiFine?
